account.title: account information
account.desc: Retrieve current balance, transaction list, account type and all elements related to your platform account.

show.title: Get information about your account
show.desc: Get information about your account: balance, accountType.

transactions.title: Get a list of the transactions made to your account
transactions.desc: Get the transactions from the user's Account..

availableNumbers.title: Find and Buy available numbers
availableNumbers.desc: The Available Numbers resource lets you search for numbers that are available for use with your application.

searchLocal.title: Search an available local number
searchLocal.desc: Search and available local number that we can buy

createLocal.title: Buy a local number
createLocal.desc: Search and order available local numbers

searchTollFree.title: Search for available toll free numbers
searchTollFree.desc: Search for available toll free numbers

createTollFree.title: Search and order available toll free numbers
createTollFree.desc: Search and order available toll free numbers

messages.title: message resources
messages.desc: Lets you send SMS text messages and view messages that were previously sent or received

fetch.title: Get a list of previous messages that were sent or received
fetch.desc: Get a list of previous messages that were sent or received

show.title: Read a message
show.desc: Get information about a message that was sent or received

link.title: Links
link.desc: Returns api instance to get information about links shared through Buffer.

shares.title: Amount of link shares
shares.desc: Returns an object with a the numbers of shares a link has had using Buffer.

url.desc: URL of the page for which the number of shares is requested.

profile.title: Social profiles
profile.desc: Returns a social media profile api instance.

id.desc: Identifier of a social media profile

show.title: Get this social profile
show.desc: Returns details of the single specified social media profile.

pending.title: List profile's pending updates
pending.desc: Returns an array of updates that are currently in the buffer for an individual social media profile.

sent.title: List profile's sent updates
sent.desc: Returns an array of updates that have been sent from the buffer for an individual social media profile.

reorder.title: Edit profile's updates order
reorder.desc: Edit the order at which statuses for the specified social media profile will be sent out of the buffer.

order.desc: An ordered array of status update id's. This can be a partial array in combination with the offset parameter or a full array of every update in the profiles Buffer.

shuffle.title: Shuffle profile's updates
shuffle.desc: Randomize the order at which statuses for the specified social media profile will be sent out of the buffer.

schedule.title: Posting schedules
schedule.desc: Returns scheduling api instance for social media profile.

id.desc: Identifier of a social media profile

list.title: Get profile's posting schedules
list.desc: Returns details of the posting schedules associated with a social media profile.

update.title: Update profile's posting schedules
update.desc: Set the posting schedules for the specified social media profile.

schedules.desc: Each item in the array is an individual posting schedule which consists of days and times to match the format return by the above method.

update.title: Social updates
update.desc: Returns a social media update api instance.

id.desc: Identifier of a social media update

show.title: Get this social update
show.desc: Returns a single social media update.

interactions.title: List interactions of the update
interactions.desc: Returns the detailed information on individual interactions with the social media update such as favorites, retweets and likes.

update.title: Edit this update
update.desc: Edit an existing, individual status update.

share.title: Share this update
share.desc: Immediately shares a single pending update and recalculates times for updates remaining in the queue.

destroy.title: Delete this update
destroy.desc: Permanently delete an existing status update.

top.title: Move this update to top
top.desc: Move an existing status update to the top of the queue and recalculate times for all updates in the queue. Returns the update with its new posting time.
